name: Dice Towers (itch)
description:
A tower defense game - with a twist! Rather than buying towers, each wave, you must roll dice to see what towers you get. The dice rolling works like yacht dice  - you can choose to lock in dice you are happy with and re-roll the remaining dice, or you can  sacrifice dice to upgrade towers for future waves.  

Towers get deleted after each wave, so you must constantly stay on your toes! Good luck and may the odds be ever in your favor.

 Tower Types

  1. Snowflake: Slows enemies in a short range. Leveling increases the slow amount. 
  2. Vine: Does more damage the further it is from the target. Leveling increases damage dealt. 
  3. Lightning: Attacks in random intervals, and on random enemies. Leveling makes it attack faster. 
  4. Arrow: Fires arrows in all four cardinal directions. Leveling makes it attack faster.
  5.  Meteor: Stores meteors slowly over time. Rapidly fires meteors that deal high damage. Leveling increases max meteors stored, storage rate, and increases damage.
  6. Crystal: Attacks rapidly in a long range, but for low damage. Leveling increases damage and range.
